channel.title: Fixded
channel.description:
I was alching items and then it said i lost connection. Then, I tried to log on and it said this, "your account has been disabled. Check your message-center for details. I can't find the message center anywheres. I looked at the rules and it said to contact a friend to tell a mod but my friend doesn't know how to. Any help would be good.
---Screenshot of problem---
http://i38.tinypic.com/28rcfmo.jpg
